elements.name: question1
elements.title: What is the advantage of Foley sounds?
elements.correctAnswer: They can be recorded exactly as required and used for production. / The quality is impeccable as they are recorded in the studio. / No interference from camera or sound men moving around the set.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: What are the disadvantages of Foley sounds?
elements.correctAnswer: They sound fake if they are not recorded carefully. / Production is time-consuming. / Production requires an expensive infrastructure.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Why are there Foley artists?
elements.correctAnswer: There are sounds that can hardly be recorded in reality. / Foley recordings allow you to control the sounds very well. / The authenticity of films can be enormously enhanced by their effects. / There are no limits to creativity with Foley recordings.
